home.description: Create, join, and conquer missions together.
home.title: Reach Your Peak in Every Mission
home.subtitle: Turn discipline into results. Launch ambitious missions and track your ascent to the top.

block1.title: Life Gamification
block1.description: Earn experience (XP) and level up by completing daily rituals and epic quests.

block2.title: Teamwork
block2.description: Complete missions together with friends. Support and healthy competition are the best keys to success.

block3.title: Tactical Control
block3.description: Convenient calendar and tracking system will help you not miss any important step towards your goal.

block4.title: Visual Progress
block4.description: Watch your growth through detailed statistics and interactive achievement charts.

loggedIn.motivational: You're already closer to your goal than yesterday

emptyMissions.text: Your path is not yet defined. Click 'Start Mission' to unlock experience treasures!

dailyChecklist.title: Daily Steps
dailyChecklist.empty: Write down your first tiny action for today to start building momentum!

checklistHistory.title: Hero's Journal
checklistHistory.subtitle: The legend is being written. Every step is a part of your story.
checklistHistory.empty: No checklists found. Start creating your daily checklists!

completionImage.title: ðŸŽ‰ All Done, {name}!
completionImage.motivational: Every small step forward is a victory. Keep going!

completionDialog.title: Congratulations!
completionDialog.message: You've completed all your daily missions! Generate a victory card to celebrate.

empty.text: The rocket is ready for refueling. What shall we plan for tomorrow?

auth.motivationText: Thousands of heroes are already changing their lives. Start your path to discipline and mastery right now.
auth.registerDescription: Join Ignite and achieve goals together with friends
auth.loginDescription: Welcome back! Log in to your account
auth.name: Name
auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.countryInvalid: Select a country from the list
auth.forgotPasswordNotImplemented: Forgot password functionality is not yet implemented.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetLinkSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {email}. Please check your email and follow the instructions.
auth.forgotPasswordFailed: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.invalidResetToken: Invalid or expired reset token. Please request a new password reset link.
auth.successRegisterBody: Your account has been created! You are now logged in.
auth.successLoginBody: Welcome back! You are now logged in.
auth.ageInteger: Age must be a whole number
auth.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Please log in to view your profile.

profile.uploadHint: PNG or JPG up to 5 MB

profile.apiKeySaveFailed: Failed to store API key. Please check browser storage settings.
profile.pushNotificationsDeniedInstructions: To enable notifications, click the lock icon in your browser's address bar and allow notifications, then refresh this page.
profile.pushNotificationsUnsupported: Your browser does not support push notifications
profile.pushNotificationsPermissionDenied: Notification permission was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
profile.pushNotificationsEnableError: Failed to enable push notifications. Please try again.

profile.dailyRecapHintEn: A nudge about pending mission steps.
profile.dailyRecapError: Failed to update daily recap settings.

challenges.motiveText: Every epic saga begins with a single choice. Define your path, Hero.
challenges.title: Title

titlePlaceholder.habit: Enter your new ritual... (e.g. 15 mins of Meditation)
titlePlaceholder.result: Define your conquest... (e.g. Run a Marathon)

challenges.coverPhotoHint: Drop an image that inspires your journey
challenges.rewardPlaceholder: For example: Paragliding flight or those sneakers...

challenges.customDurationHint: Enter the number of days for your challenge
challenges.personalPathDesc: Your progress is hidden from everyone. Only you can see your achievements.
challenges.commonWorldDesc: Your mission will appear in the Explore feed. Other heroes can support you.
challenges.shareLinkAfterCreation: After creation, you will receive a unique link to invite allies to this quest.

successModal.title: THE PATH IS FORGED!
successModal.message: Your journey has officially begun. The first step is where legends start. Are you ready?

challenges.typeHabitDescription: Forge greatness through consistency. Small daily steps build an unbreakable spirit.
challenges.typeResultDescription: Conquer a major milestone. Define a clear objective and reach the finish line.
